title: @Riot Either nerf everyone or give us back Tank Yasuo
body:
I am fucking sick as shit playing against the cancer that is fucking CC champions. Every event mode, the same champions. Every game, the same fuckign champions. Lux, Morgana, Veigar, Brand, you name it. How is it fucking fair they can stun us and completely counter us, but we can't do shit about it? All Of the fucking tenacity in game doesn't help or do shit. QSS is useless when you have cancers such as veigar and Brand who literally stun you, and even when you use qss, you are dead before it takes effect.

You give us 35% tenacity, maybe 41% if you use masteries, but it doesn't do shit. You have fights that last 1 second. Literally 1 fucking second, yet they can stun you for much much longer. Like how is it fair at fucking all? You nerf Yasuo so he can't tank, but give us no viable tenacity or counter to the stuns. Clease is useless, so is qss, so are merc treads. Like Veigar can stun you, and literally kit you before the stun is up and you are dead, especially late game. 

Wtf do you want from fucking us. We can't get near adcs, most have CC. We can't get near mages. We can't get near most tanks, nor supports. So wtf do you want? we can't tank, can't have tenacity, you buff all the other cancers in game, and pretend it doesn't happen.

replies.body:
"give us back Tank Yasuo"

Your entire argument is now invalid and dismissed.

Yasuo isn't meant to tank, he is a squishy assassin that has high damage. He's meant to survive by outplaying opponents and killing them before they kill him. Learn how to avoid skillshots, yasuo is mobile isn't he?

Every champ you listed has a skillshot stun. Even if I hate Lux... you can't say that wind wall doesn't completely counter them as well. Their CC is how they function. Avoid it and they're defenseless

> Every game, the same fuckign champions. Lux, Morgana, Veigar, Brand, you name it. How is it fucking fair they can stun us and completely counter us, but we can't do shit about it?

Are you kidding me?  All of those champions cc are slow moving projectiles. And morgs ulti has a leash range.  As yasuo you have access to windwall and his dash which makes it very easy to dodge/completely negate their cc.  

You can do shit about it, git gud.

EDIT: Veigar cc isnt a projectile but his main dmg sources of q and ulti can be blocked by windwall and w is so easy to avoid.
